entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected to develop near the summit this afternoon or evening. 2 to 3 cm of snow may accumulate on the road near the summit this evening and early tomorrow morning.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
